parameters: "Curse Energy and First Class Perpetual Motion"
"It's a scene from a variety show that I saw in my childhood.
I still remember it vividly. Make a propeller that rotates with magnetic force,
Attach it to a small car toy. And self-propelled
Pointing to a toy, "This is a perpetual motion"
An elderly man proclaiming that he was being praised in the program. 』\

I was thrilled that I could continue.
However, even if you make a similar device, it does not work well.

"When I think about it now, what I was using in that variety show was
